name: Seabattle - 2D Minigame
description:
Seabattle 2.4.0  [Current Version]

Be part of an everlasting sea battle between your fleet and a bunch of pirates.
Control your Ship with the use of your keyboard and eliminate them one by one!

But be careful: there are other dangers lurking...

Victory Condition
If your ship is destroyed, you will automatically respawn, but at the same time you will be thrown back one level. The goal is to survive as many levels as possible and thereby collect points. Currently levels are random, with bosses having a much lower spawn probability.

The Art Of Survival
All ships, just before they can be destroyed, are in a state where they can be boarded. Boarding an enemy ship allows you to both heal and upgrade your own ship. Generally, the larger a ship, the more HP and damage it has, but the more cumbersome it becomes. Different types of ships have different characteristics.

Controls

Attack -> [Space]
Heal -> [Enter]/[shift]

Move Forward -> [arrow up]/[W]
Move Backward -> [arrow down]/[S]

Turn Left -> [arrow left]/[A]
Turn Right -> [arrow right]/[D]

Add Next Level Spawn -> [+]
Start/Stop Music -> [M]
